mapper.select: SELECT id, additional_id, is_first, is_double_language, is_weekend, is_delete, is_sure, gmt_create, gmt_modified FROM additional_coefficients WHERE additional_id = #{additional} AND is_sure!=2
SELECT COUNT(id) FROM additional_coefficients WHERE additional_id = #{additional} AND is_sure == 0

SELECT u.user_name, ac.additional_id, ac.is_sure, ac.is_first, ac.is_double_language, ac.is_weekend, t.teach_name, GROUP_CONCAT(c.class_name SEPARATOR '+') AS class_names FROM additional_coefficients ac LEFT JOIN main m ON ac.additional_id = m.additional LEFT JOIN USER u ON m.user_id = u.user_id LEFT JOIN teach t ON m.unique_number = t.teach_id LEFT JOIN teach_class tc ON m.unique_number = tc.unique_number LEFT JOIN class c ON tc.class_id = c.class_id WHERE ac.is_sure = 0;
